    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.gantt.config.Locale#setDstHorizons] Sets a new value for property {@link #getDstHorizons dstHorizons}. Day-light saving time periods. Array of {@link sap.gantt.config.TimeHorizon} other locale info like langu, dateFormat, timeFormat and numberFormat, please use UI5 standard configuration object. When called with a value of <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is <code>[]</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.gantt.config.Locale#setUtcdiff] Sets a new value for property {@link #getUtcdiff utcdiff}. Gap value to the UTC time in the format hhmmss When called with a value of <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is <code>"000000"</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.gantt.config.Locale#setUtcsign] Sets a new value for property {@link #getUtcsign utcsign}. Sign of the gap to the UTC time. Two valid values: "+" or "-". When called with a value of <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is <code>"+"</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable#getEnableDateTimezoneFormatter] Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableDateTimezoneFormatter enableDateTimezoneFormatter}. Flag to check whether the DateFormat should be used for Fiori launchpad timezone support. This flag is experimental, and it might be removed in a future release. When the flag is enabled, the start and end time for the shapes that are created outside of the <code>GanttChartWithTable</code> scope are not formatted to the Fiori launchpad timezone, unless those property values are binded again. Default value is <code>false</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable#setEnableDateTimezoneFormatter] Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableDateTimezoneFormatter enableDateTimezoneFormatter}. Flag to check whether the DateFormat should be used for Fiori launchpad timezone support. This flag is experimental, and it might be removed in a future release. When the flag is enabled, the start and end time for the shapes that are created outside of the <code>GanttChartWithTable</code> scope are not formatted to the Fiori launchpad timezone, unless those property values are binded again. When called with a value of <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is <code>false</code>.

Please have a look at the browser-native page lifecycle API, e.g. its events 'pageshow' and 'pagehide'.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getLanguageTag] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getLanguageTag} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getLocale] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getLanguageTag} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getRTL] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getRTL} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getSAPLogonLanguage] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getSAPLogonLanguage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getTheme] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.getTheme} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getTimezone] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getTimezone} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getUIDPrefix] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObjectMetadata.getUIDPrefix ManagedObjectMetadata.getUIDPrefix} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setLanguage] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.setLanguage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setRTL] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.setRTL} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setTheme] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.setTheme} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setTimezone] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.setTimezone} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#applyTheme] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.setTheme Theming.setTheme} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachControlEvent] Registers a listener for control events. When called, the context of the listener (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to a dummy event provider object.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachLibraryChanged] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.attachLibraryChanged Lib.attachLibraryChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#byId] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Element.getElementById Element.getElementById} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#createRenderManager] Returns a new instance of the RenderManager for exclusive use by the caller. The caller must take care to destroy the render manager when it is no longer needed. Calling this method before the Core has been {@link #isInitialized initialized}, is not recommended.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachControlEvent] Unregisters a listener for control events. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachLibraryChanged] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.detachLibraryChanged Lib.detachLibraryChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#extend] Creates a new subclass of class <code>sap.ui.core.Core</code> with name <code>sClassName</code> and enriches it with the information contained in <code>oClassInfo</code>. <code>oClassInfo</code> might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject.extend}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getCurrentFocusedControlId] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Element.getActiveElement Element.getActiveElement} to get the currently focused element. You can then retrieve the ID of that element with {@link sap.ui.core.Element#getId Element#getId}. Please be aware, {@link sap.ui.core.Element.getActiveElement Element.getActiveElement} can return 'undefined'.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getEventBus] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.EventBus.getInstance EventBus.getInstance} for global usage instead. Creating an own local instance is the preferred usage.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getLibraryResourceBundle] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.getResourceBundleFor Lib.getResourceBundleFor} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getLoadedLibraries] Returns a map of library info objects for all currently loaded libraries, keyed by their names. The structure of the library info objects matches the structure of the info object that the {@link #initLibrary} method expects. Only property names documented with <code>initLibrary</code> should be accessed, any additional properties might change or disappear in future. When a property does not exists, its default value (as documented with <code>initLibrary</code>) should be assumed. <b>Note:</b> The returned info objects must not be modified. They might be a living copy of the internal data (for efficiency reasons) and the framework is not prepared to handle modifications to these objects.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getMetadata] Returns the metadata for class <code>sap.ui.core.Core</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getStaticAreaRef] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/StaticArea.getDomRef StaticArea.getDomRef} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#includeLibraryTheme] Includes a library theme into the current page (if a variant is specified it will include the variant library theme)
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#initLibrary] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.init Lib.init} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isStaticAreaRef] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/StaticArea.contains StaticArea.contains} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isThemeApplied] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.attachApplied Theming.attachApplied} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#loadLibraries] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.load Lib.load} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#loadLibrary] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.load Lib.load} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#notifyContentDensityChanged] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.notifyContentDensityChanged Theming.notifyContentDensityChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#setThemeRoot] Defines the root directory from below which UI5 should load the theme with the given name. Optionally allows restricting the setting to parts of a theme covering specific control libraries. Example: <pre> sap.ui.getCore().setThemeRoot("my_theme", "https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes"); sap.ui.getCore().applyTheme("my_theme"); </pre> will cause the following file to be loaded (assuming that the bootstrap is configured to load libraries <code>sap.m</code> and <code>sap.ui.layout</code>): <pre> https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/sap/ui/core/themes/my_theme/library.css https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/sap/ui/layout/themes/my_theme/library.css https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/sap/m/themes/my_theme/library.css </pre> If parts of the theme are at different locations (e.g. because you provide a standard theme like "sap_belize" for a custom control library and this self-made part of the standard theme is at a different location than the UI5 resources), you can also specify for which control libraries the setting should be used, by giving an array with the names of the respective control libraries as second parameter: <pre> sap.ui.getCore().setThemeRoot("sap_belize", ["my.own.library"], "https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes"); </pre> This will cause the Belize theme to be loaded from the UI5 location for all standard libraries. Resources for styling the <code>my.own.library</code> controls will be loaded from the configured location: <pre> https://sdk.openui5.org/resources/sap/ui/core/themes/sap_belize/library.css https://sdk.openui5.org/resources/sap/ui/layout/themes/sap_belize/library.css https://sdk.openui5.org/resources/sap/m/themes/sap_belize/library.css https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/my/own/library/themes/sap_belize/library.css </pre> If the custom theme should be loaded initially (via bootstrap attribute), the <code>themeRoots</code> property of the <code>window["sap-ui-config"]</code> object must be used instead of calling <code>sap.ui.getCore().setThemeRoot(...)</code> in order to configure the theme location early enough.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#libraryChanged] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.attachLibraryChanged Lib.attachLibraryChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#getSecurityToken] use {@link #securityTokenAvailable} instead
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.Input#getValueHelpOnly] The property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.Input#isValueHelpOnlyOpener] the property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.Input#setValueHelpOnly] The property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.MultiInput#isValueHelpOnlyOpener] the property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#attachRowHeaderClick] Attaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> to the {@link #event:rowHeaderClick rowHeaderClick} event of this <code>sap.m.PlanningCalendar</code>. When called, the context of the event handler (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this <code>sap.m.PlanningCalendar</code> itself. Fires when a row header is clicked.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#detachRowHeaderClick] Detaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> from the {@link #event:rowHeaderClick rowHeaderClick} event of this <code>sap.m.PlanningCalendar</code>. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#fireRowHeaderClick] Fires event {@link #event:rowHeaderClick rowHeaderClick} to attached listeners.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#getAppointmentsReducedHeight] Please use the <code>appointmentHeight</code> with value "Automatic" property instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#setAppointmentsReducedHeight] Please use the <code>appointmentHeight</code> with value "Automatic" property instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#rowHeaderClick] Fires when a row header is clicked.

item.title: Version 1.120.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Allow resize columns by dragging
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: List Card Placeholders rendering is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridList: Navigation matrix elements are included if they have DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Keyboard navigation after focusItem() now continues from the focused item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayoutSemanticHelper: Action buttons info corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Attribute icon in List card is now always on the same line with text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Fixed cut off corners in sap.f.Card sample
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now added a confirmation dialog that allows end users to invite other users in apps that support the collaborative draft mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: In apps that support the collaborative draft mode, we've now provided a confirmation dialog asking users to save or discard their changes when leaving a page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now optimized the execution of multiple side effects based on the same context by merging them to prevent redundant requests for the same properties
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display separate columns for the editing status and business situation in grid tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 now allows you to use the KPITag building block in list reports
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 now allows you to use the KPITag building block in list reports
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define the table selection mode using the parameters ForceMulti and ForceSingle, even when no actions are available
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: When you click on the email field used in a table or a form, you can now use the communication options provided by Microsoft Teams
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow the MultiValueField to be used in edit mode within a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setting for app developers to enable their users to automatically access the latest draft, if applicable, when creating a draft root entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing units are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow you to set default values using the manifest for annotation-based filters on the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the navigation to the object page from the list report table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that message handling works correctly when the bound action is called using invokeAction
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the LastSemanticMapping cache is cleared while using the navigateToRoute function
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the metadata model of the control is linked to the value help for conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved the issue of the Delete action not working when the header description is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the visibility of the paginator is updated on the subobject page even after a new entry was added or deleted for the object page list binding by using side effects
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now provide the correct formatting and text arrangement for semantic key fields annotated with semantic objects
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now navigate back to the object page after clicking the Apply button on the subobject page, even if there are errors from the back end
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use semantic keys while navigating directly from the list report to the draft node of the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the secondary actions in the page-level toolbar appear in ghost style and the secondary actions in the content-level toolbar appear in transparent style.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing timezones are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing timestamps are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with executed actions that result in a structure
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now evaluate the HeaderInfo.TypeNamePlural annotation as an empty string if it isn't defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with the custom configuration of the MenuButton
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now indicate if a table column contains required fields also in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an action can also be hidden based on annotations defined in EntityType
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with the visibility of the subsection on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues with using inline creation mode in building block tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the pageReady event has a context when fired
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Apply button now works correctly when there are information or warning messages in the message button
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the saved draft is displayed when a user tries to overwrite another user's draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure correct formatting and text arrangement for semantic key fields annotated with semantic objects
    • Type: FIX, Description: Actions that are triggered multiple times without strict handling and return a warning are now terminated correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display separate columns for the editing status and business situation in grid tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the communication options provided by Microsoft Teams in the quick view containing the contact information
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 now allows you to use the KPITag building block in list reports
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define the table selection mode using the parameters ForceMulti and ForceSingle, even when no actions are available
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: When you click on the email field used in a table or a form, you can now use the communication options provided by Microsoft Teams
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow the MultiValueField to be used in edit mode within a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: SideEffects network requests on structural changes (create/delete) relying on MultiValueField are now ordered appropriately
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing units are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the navigation from a quick view when the TextArrangementType annotation is used for the field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the draft indicator is not templated in key columns inside grid tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header level for the object page table and macro chart are set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the column width calculation when the table is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the quick view not appearing when the user clicks on fields and field links
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the avatar of the user locking the object in a collaborative draft scenario is resized to fit correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with duplicate fields in contact cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the metadata model of the control is linked to the value help for conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the empty indicator if a contact block link is not maintained
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now provide the correct formatting and text arrangement for semantic key fields annotated with semantic objects
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that resulted in the contact card automatically closing in some cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the secondary actions in the page-level toolbar appear in ghost style and the secondary actions in the content-level toolbar appear in transparent style.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the avatar in the correct aspect ratio within the collapsed header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing timestamps are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now evaluate the HeaderInfo.TypeNamePlural annotation as an empty string if it isn't defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've added sap.fe.macros.FlexibleColumnLayoutActions to the API documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with the custom configuration of the MenuButton
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show an incorrect property '$editState' in the table personalization dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues with using inline creation mode in building block tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with navigating to an incorrect TargetControl from the message button
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure correct formatting and text arrangement for semantic key fields annotated with semantic objects
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now added a confirmation dialog that allows end users to invite other users in apps that support the collaborative draft mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: In apps that support the collaborative draft mode, we've now provided a confirmation dialog asking users to save or discard their changes when leaving a page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display separate columns for the editing status and business situation in grid tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: : We've added a function using the extension API that selects a specific tab programmatically on the list report with multiple tabs
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 now allows you to use the KPITag building block in list reports
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 now allows you to use the KPITag building block in list reports
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: When you click on the email field used in a table or a form, you can now use the communication options provided by Microsoft Teams
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setting for app developers to enable their users to automatically access the latest draft, if applicable, when creating a draft root entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message strip on the object page is now context-specific
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header level for the object page table and macro chart are set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved the issue of the Delete action not working when the header description is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the empty indicator if a contact block link is not maintained
    • Type: FIX, Description: Filters with default values is now getting stored in selectionVariant and passed correctly during cross navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the secondary actions in the page-level toolbar appear in ghost style and the secondary actions in the content-level toolbar appear in transparent style.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the avatar in the correct aspect ratio within the collapsed header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that accessing list report tables using the onTable() selector provided by the OPA API works correctly for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now evaluate the HeaderInfo.TypeNamePlural annotation as an empty string if it isn't defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the object page scrolls to the correct section when the user clicks on a data point
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.7 and v4.19
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Improve removal of selection
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the linkTileContents aggregation that can render an icon and a link on the generic tile
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CLDR upgrade to version 43.0.0
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap/ui/core/DeclarativeSupport
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: introduce new set of indication colors
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: DataType, Library: Enable enum type registration without globals
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: OPA tests in demo app are now running
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.CustomMonthPicker: fixed missing year in internal MonthPicker
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Reopen Suggestion Popover when new data is bound
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Type-ahead functionality corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Condition for validating text calculated properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: f7 qunit is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Reopen Suggestion Popover when new data is bound
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: getDomRef() now returns proper DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: adjust keyboard interaction
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: List Card Placeholders rendering is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: improve documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RangeSlider: apply active state to tickmarks correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.BusyIndicator: Position of the Busy Indicator in Bar is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Circle is correctly aligned on RTL mode and Compact form factor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: week-related options now return proper values
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust to horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: validation errors from value help are not propagated outside
    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: drag & drop preview placeholder is always correctly sized
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Keyboard Shortcuts should not execute when in editable content
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Set end button to pos 0 when no begin button is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire intervalSelect event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Reposition ValueStateHeader when long text is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: DateNavigation now uses firstDayOfWeek
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Html structure improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: correction for icon 'slim-arrow-up' for theme 'horizon'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix overflowing controls with 100% width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Value is now formatted even if matching with previous value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Avatar is not shown if there is no icon set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: Synchronize max appointment count
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationListBase: Priority icons are now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: Align button type to design guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: valueHelpOnly deprecation is now corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Item selection with dynamic suggestions now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: CopyProvider: Search owner control for CellSelector
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabFilter: Avoid reading parent properties if it doesn't exist during UI Adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust external label references
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Added "width" property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Badge on Button for Compact content density is properly positioned now
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartFilterBar: The typeahead functionality for MultiComboBox is enhanced
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartField: The typeahead functionality for combo boxes is enhanced
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartField: Lazy loading of annotations in SmartTable when useSmartField:true is now implemented
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ValueHelpDialog: sap.m.plugins.CellSelector is now enabled for the table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartFilterBar: OUT Parameters for date fields with DDR picker are now supported
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlProvider: unstable tests fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: suggestions Show All Items button is now hidden when value help is disabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Warning state is not set on the Amount when the Unit is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Validation of ComboBox selectedKey can be skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: When a filter variant with date format is applied, the new value is now shown
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent invalid values from AdaptFilters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Add/Remove condition announcement now has correct order
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: Ignore toolbar content with unstable ids for move adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Extra space below FilterBar filters is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Adapt Filters Dialog now has proper style class when used in RTA
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: SmartField with opened suggestions now always fires change event on value change
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Initialized event not fired
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: correct Edm.String interval when it is used with int operations
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: util/resolveReference: use probing-require before getting from global
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.7 and v4.19
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of ManagedObject.create
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: Support transitionMessagesOnly binding parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: deprecate blanket-based code instrumentation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate sap.ui.core.Configuration and API 'getConfiguration' on sap.ui.core.Core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of JSONView
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel: Support for withCredentials no longer experimental
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: Support transitionMessagesOnly binding parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap.ui.core.Configuration.AnimationMode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate FormatSettings in sap.ui.core.Configuration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate APIs 'getAccessibility', 'getAnimationMode', and 'setAnimationMode' on sap.ui.core.Configuration.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/Configuration: deprecate fiori2Adaptation setting
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Introduce sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate jQuery.sap.storage / jQuery.sap.util.UriParameters
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CLDR upgrade to version 43.0.0
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate APIs 'getAppCacheBuster' and 'getAppCacheBusterMode' on sap.ui.core.Configuration.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ushell.Container#createRenderer] Creates a new renderer instance for the given renderer name. Names without a dot are interpreted as package names within the default naming convention and will be expanded to <code>"sap.ushell.renderers." + sRendererName + ".Renderer"</code>. Names containing a dot are used "as is". The resulting name must point to a SAPUI5 object which is first required and then instantiated (without arguments). The object is expected to be a UI component (i.e. extend <code>sap.ui.core.UIComponent</code>), which is then automatically wrapped into a <code>sap.ui.core.ComponentContainer</code> control by this method. The <code>sap.ui.core.ComponentContainer</code> is created with <code>height</code> and <code>width</code> set to "100%" to accommodate the complete available space. Besides UIComponents a control (i.e. extend <code>sap.ui.core.Control</code>) is accepted, too. The returned renderer is supposed to be added to a direct child (for example <code>div</code>) of the <code>body</code> of the page and there should be no other parts of the page consuming space outside the renderer. Use CSS class <code>sapUShellFullHeight</code> at <code>html</code>, <code>body</code> and at the element to which the renderer is added to allow the renderer to use 100% height.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/base/util/mixedFetch#undefined] Allows to perform an synchronous or asynchronous XMLHttpRequest (XHR) with the provided resource URL and request settings. It returns a Promise resolving with an <code>module:sap/base/util/SimpleResponse</code> object, which is a simplified implementation of the global Response interface, representing the response of the XHR. It returns a <code>sap.ui.base.SyncPromise</code>, if the parameter <code>bSync</code> is set to 'true'. If the request encounters network failures, the returned promise will be rejected with a <code>TypeError</code>. In case of an HTTP error status (e.g. error status 404), the returned promise will resolve instead. The properties <code>response.ok</code> or <code>response.status</code> can be used to distinguish a success status from an error status. The Promise or SyncPromise will reject with a <code>DOMException</code> if the request gets aborted. To abort a request, an instance of the global <code>AbortSignal</code> must be provided to the settings. An abort signal can be created via an instance of the <code>AbortController</code>, and then using the <code>AbortController.signal</code> property. The signal associates the abort controller with the request and allows it to abort the XHR by calling <code>AbortController.abort()</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/base/util/syncFetch#undefined] Performs a synchronous XMLHttpRequest (XHR) with the provided resource URL and request settings. It returns a <code>module:sap/base/util/SimpleResponse</code> object, which is a simplified implementation of the global Response interface, representing the response of the XHR. If the request encounters network failures, this method will throw a <code>TypeError</code>. In case of an HTTP error status (e.g. error status 404), no error will be thrown. The properties <code>response.ok</code> or <code>response.status</code> can be used to distinguish a success status from an error status. A <code>DOMException</code> will be thrown if the request gets aborted. To abort a request, an instance of the global <code>AbortSignal</code> must be provided to the settings. An abort signal can be created via an instance of the <code>AbortController</code>, and then using the <code>AbortController.signal</code> property. The signal associates the abort controller with the request and allows it to abort the XHR by calling <code>AbortController.abort()</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.base.Object#isA] please use {@link sap.ui.base.Object.isObjectA}.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#undefined] Collects and stores the configuration of the current environment. The Configuration is initialized once when the {@link sap.ui.core.Core} is created. There are different ways to set the environment configuration (in ascending priority): <ol> <li>System defined defaults</li> <li>Server wide defaults, read from /sap-ui-config.json</li> <li>Properties of the global configuration object window["sap-ui-config"]</li> <li>A configuration string in the data-sap-ui-config attribute of the bootstrap tag.</li> <li>Individual data-sap-ui-<i>xyz</i> attributes of the bootstrap tag</li> <li>Using URL parameters</li> <li>Setters in this Configuration object (only for some parameters)</li> </ol> That is, attributes of the DOM reference override the system defaults, URL parameters override the DOM attributes (where empty URL parameters set the parameter back to its system default). Calling setters at runtime will override any previous settings calculated during object creation. The naming convention for parameters is: <ul> <li>in the URL : sap-ui-<i>PARAMETER-NAME</i>="value"</li> <li>in the DOM : data-sap-ui-<i>PARAMETER-NAME</i>="value"</li> </ul> where <i>PARAMETER-NAME</i> is the name of the parameter in lower case. Values of boolean parameters are case insensitive where "true" and "x" are interpreted as true.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#applySettings] Applies multiple changes to the configuration at once. If the changed settings contain localization related settings like <code>language</code> or <ode>calendarType</code>, then only a single <code>localizationChanged</code> event will be fired. As the framework has to inform all existing components, elements, models etc. about localization changes, using <code>applySettings</code> can significantly reduce the overhead for multiple changes, esp. when they occur after the UI has been created already. The <code>mSettings</code> can contain any property <code><i>xyz</i></code> for which a setter method <code>set<i>XYZ</i></code> exists in the API of this class. Similarly, values for the {@link sap.ui.core.Configuration.FormatSettings format settings} API can be provided in a nested object with name <code>formatSettings</code>.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setFormatLocale] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Formatting.setLanguageTag} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setSecurityTokenHandlers] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/security/Security.setSecurityTokenHandlers} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration.AnimationMode#undefined] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/AnimationMode} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration.FormatSettings#undefined] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Formatting} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration.FormatSettings#getFormatLocale] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Formatting.getLanguageTag} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getConfiguration] Please see {@link sap.ui.core.Configuration Configuration} for the corrsponding replacements.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.date.CalendarWeekNumbering#undefined] Please use {@link module:sap/base/18n/date/CalendarWeekNumbering} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.DeclarativeSupport#undefined] Please consider using {@link sap.ui.core.mvc.XMLView XMLViews} or {@link topic:e6bb33d076dc4f23be50c082c271b9f0 Typed Views} instead. For more information, see the documentation on {@link topic:91f27e3e6f4d1014b6dd926db0e91070 View types}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.mvc.JSONView#undefined] please consider using {@link sap.ui.core.mvc.XMLView XMLViews} or "typed views" (view classes written in JavaScript) instead. For more information, see the documentation on {@link topic:91f27e3e6f4d1014b6dd926db0e91070 View types}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nColumnsItem#undefined] Type for <code>columnsItems</code> aggregation in <code>P13nColumnsPanel</code> control.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nDimMeasureItem#undefined] Type for <code>columnsItems</code> aggregation in <code>P13nDimMeasurePanel</code> control.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nDimMeasurePanel#undefined] The P13nDimMeasurePanel control is used to define chart-specific settings like chart type, the visibility, the order and roles of dimensions and measures for table personalization.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nGroupItem#undefined] Type for <code>groupItems</code> aggregation in P13nGroupPanel control.

item.title: Version 1.120.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.1

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: fix not visible column
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Restrict column size
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the preferredMode=edit parameter that launches an object page directly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure you can empty an email field after you’ve entered a valid email address
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the SideEffects annotation can request messages on a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the EditState that led to an additional refresh of the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with using the OData V2 model on the overview page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the enabled property of the delete button in a table is updated, after an action was carried out
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved the button style issue in the footer of the Accept Recommendations confirmation dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that selecting the begin button in an action parameter dialog only triggers the action once
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the SideEffects annotation also on the overview page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the getKey() function is used to access the key value of oVariant, as the object structure has changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: The FPM Explorer now works properly even during long sessions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the byID provided by our ExtensionAPI returns custom controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure text annotation is considered for semantic keys inside a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing progress data points are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the TypeDefinition is managed as a typed property when the entity is declared directly in a CAP service
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use a separate ListBinding for the singleDraftForCreate setting
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application can load even with an unexpected format set on the TargetProperties of a SideEffects annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType ‘Exclude’ for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that prevented updating a field with the static unit of measure ‘%’
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure you can close a column in an app using the flexible column layout after an intent-based navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table to spreadsheet, the "Target Value" column is no longer included for DataPoints without a target value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the handling of 412 errors when the action is triggered using the chevron
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a multi-valued field in a list report that uses the flexible column layout is not editable when the object page is in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the maximum allowed length of an email address when entering it in an input field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the byID provided by our ExtensionAPI returns custom controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure text annotation is considered for semantic keys inside a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing progress data points are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the width of a text area in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType ‘Exclude’ for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that prevented updating a field with the static unit of measure ‘%’
    • Type: FIX, Description: Drag and drop is now disabled when dragging an item from a tree table and dropping it outside the tree table
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table to spreadsheet, the "Target Value" column is no longer included for DataPoints without a target value
    • Type: FIX, Description: The messageButton link is now disabled if the associated message is not targeting a property
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues when adding items using a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the filter values of value help used on a multi-valued field are retrieved correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the preferredMode=edit parameter that launches an object page directly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the opensOnFocus value of the MDC field is set based on the focusInfo parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set the focus on the first editable field upon the initial load of the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues when adding items using a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the opensOnFocus value is set based on the focusInfo parameter
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: using a stable date in a test scenario
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Lazy loading of annotations in SmartTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent invalid values from AdaptFilters dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap/ui/core/search classes
    • Type: FIX, Description: Interaction: Fix start time determination
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)LegacyDateCalendarCustomizing to sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)CustomIslamicCalendarData
    • Type: FIX, Description: onlocalizationEvent not fired
    • Type: FIX, Description: ManagedObjectMetadata: Introduce missing 'defaultClass' setting for aggregations
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Component: skip the sync processing of i18n before resources are loaded
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.documentation: replace UI5 URLs correctly when samples are downloaded
  • Library: sap.ui.dt
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: not possible to enter multiple lines
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Autocomplete shows wrong value if backend slow
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: onlocalizationEvent not fired
  • Library: sap.ui.ux3
    • Type: FIX, Description: Interaction: Fix start time determination
  • Library: sap.ui.webc.common
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)LegacyDateCalendarCustomizing to sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)CustomIslamicCalendarData
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: FlattenedDataset: define defaultClass for "dimensions" and "measure" aggregation

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.FilterProcessor.combineFilters: combine Filter.NONE with other filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/XMLTemplateProcessor: load class of nested view before instance creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataMessageParser#_createTarget: normalize also the full target
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.odata4analytics.FilterExpression#renderUI5FilterArray: fix sorting of filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.message.Message fix references to MessageType
    • Type: FIX, Description: Deprecate sap.ui.core.Message/MessageType
    • Type: FIX, Description: Deprecate public registry of Component, Element and UIArea
    • Type: FIX, Description: Views: Cloning a View is deprecated in favor of the specific factory functions
    • Type: FIX, Description: Ensure correct 'resource-root' and 'theme-root' configuration
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.action.EnterText: Revert restriction
    • Type: FIX, Description: Lib/ui5loader: Provide deprecation message for pseudo-modules
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Shortcut: trigger "blur" within a timeout
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mTable: consider useFirstMatch on filtering existing items
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: first item shown as selected too when other item is selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Currency/unit value do not overwrite initial parts with null
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Column: Sort order if "sorted" and "sortOrder" are bound
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust week days announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: prevent unexpected error
